STATIC_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: エンチャント（クリーチャー）
STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local attach_filter = Object():AttachmentFilter_Get() attach_filter:Clear() attach_filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE )

STATIC_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 as long as it's a Human. Otherwise, it can't attack or block.
La creatura incantata prende +2/+2 fintanto che è un Umano. Altrimenti, non può attaccare o bloccare.
Die verzauberte Kreatur erhält +2/+2, solange sie ein Mensch ist. Anderenfalls kann sie nicht angreifen oder blocken.
La créature enchantée gagne +2/+2 tant qu'elle est un humain. Sinon, elle ne peut ni attaquer ni bloquer.
La criatura encantada obtiene +2/+2 mientras sea Humano. De lo contrario, no puede atacar o bloquear.
エンチャントされているクリーチャーは、それが人間であるかぎり＋２/＋２の修整を受ける。 そうでないかぎり、それは攻撃したりブロックしたりできない。
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 as long as it's a Human. Otherwise, it can't attack or block.
Зачарованное существо получает +2/+2, пока оно является Человеком. В противном случае оно не может атаковать или блокировать.
A criatura encantada recebe +2/+2 enquanto é do tipo Humano. Do contrário, ela não pode atacar nem bloquear.
STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local parent = Object():GetParent() if parent ~= nil then if (parent:GetSubType():Test( CREATURE_TYPE_HUMAN ) ~= 0) then parent:GetCurrentCharacteristics():Power_Add( 2 ) parent:GetCurrentCharacteristics():Toughness_Add( 2 ) else parent:GetCurrentCharacteristics():Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_CANT_ATTACK, 1 ) parent:GetCurrentCharacteristics():Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_CANT_BLOCK, 1 ) end end

SPELL_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY )
SPELL_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local target_card = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) if target_card ~= nil then Object():Enchant( target_card ) end
